abstract: Big 12 conference praises Baylor University's conduct since investigation concluded its culture contributed to sex assault scandal involving football players.

headline.print_headline: Colleges; Big 12 Praises Baylor for Actions After Scandal
headline.main: Big 12, Moving Past Baylor Scandal, Considers Expansion

snippet: The smallest Power 5 conference is satisfied with the university’s response to an N.C.A.A. investigation and is vetting potential members....
lead_paragraph: The smallest Power 5 conference is satisfied with the university’s response to an N.C.A.A. investigation and is vetting potential members.
